trans-unit.source: Represents a control that acts as a container for a group of controls within a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤 내 그룹에 대 한 컨테이너 역할을 하는 컨트롤을 나타냅니다는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: In this topic: - [Introduction](#introduction) - [Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## Introduction The View control is a container for a group of controls.
trans-unit.target: 이 항목의:- [소개](#introduction) - [선언적 구문](#declarative_syntax) # # 소개 The View 컨트롤은 컨트롤의 그룹에 대 한 컨테이너입니다.

trans-unit.source: A View control must always be contained within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control.
trans-unit.target: 뷰 컨트롤에 항상 포함 되어야 합니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>

trans-unit.source: Only one View control at a time can be defined as the active view within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control.
trans-unit.target: 한 번에 하나의 뷰 컨트롤의 활성 뷰를 정의할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> property specifies the active View control within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.Views%2A> collection of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A>속성 내에서 활성화 된 View 컨트롤 지정는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.Views%2A>의 컬렉션을 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.Views%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The active view control is rendered to the client, as long as the containing <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control is visible.
trans-unit.target: 활성화 된 view 컨트롤을 포함 하는 클라이언트에 렌더링 되 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>컨트롤이 표시 됩니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Visible%2A> property to determine whether a View control and its child controls are visible on the page and rendered to the client.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Visible%2A>되는지 확인 하려면 뷰 컨트롤 및 해당 자식 컨트롤이 페이지에 표시 되 고 렌더링 된 클라이언트에 대 한 속성.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Visible%2A>

trans-unit.source: A View control can contain controls of any type, including other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> controls.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤을 포함 한 다른 모든 형식의 컨트롤을 포함할 수 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>

trans-unit.source: A View control does not support any style properties.
trans-unit.target: 뷰 컨트롤에서 모든 스타일 속성을 지원 하지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: To apply styles to a View control, add one or more <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> controls to the View control.
trans-unit.target: 뷰 컨트롤에 스타일을 적용 하려면 하나 이상의 추가 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>뷰 컨트롤에 컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>

trans-unit.source: The View class provides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate> events.
trans-unit.target: 뷰 클래스를 제공는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate>및 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate>이벤트.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate> event is raised when the current View control becomes the active view.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate>현재 뷰 컨트롤에는 활성 뷰가 될 때 이벤트가 발생 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate>

trans-unit.source: This occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> property changes or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.SetActiveView%2A> method is called to specify a different View control.
trans-unit.target: 이 문제가 발생 때의 값은 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A>속성 변경 내용을 또는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.SetActiveView%2A>메서드는 서로 다른 뷰 컨트롤을 지정 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.SetActiveView%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if `View1` is the active view within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control, when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> property changes to specify `View2`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate> event is raised for `View2` and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate> event is raised for `View1`.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 경우 `View1` 내에서 현재 보기가 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>제어 때는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A>속성 변경 내용을 지정 `View2`, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate>에 대 한 이벤트는 `View2` 및 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate>에 대 한 이벤트는 `View1`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>

trans-unit.source: To allow users to navigate between multiple View controls within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control, you can add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control to each View control.
trans-unit.target: 사용자가 여러 뷰 컨트롤 내에서 탐색할 수 있도록는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>컨트롤을 추가할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>또는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>각 뷰 컨트롤에 컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control's `CommandName` property to the ID of the View control to navigate to.
trans-unit.target: 설정 된 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>또는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>컨트롤의 `CommandName` 속성을 이동 하려면 View 컨트롤의 ID입니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>

trans-unit.source: For a code example, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewChanged>.
trans-unit.target: 코드 예제에서는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewChanged>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewChanged> 을 참조 하십시오.

trans-unit.source: For more information on manipulating View controls within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> topic.
trans-unit.target: 내에서 뷰 컨트롤을 조작에 대 한 자세한 내용은 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>제어, 참조는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>항목.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>

trans-unit.source: ## Declarative Syntax ``` ```
trans-unit.target: # # 선언적 구문``` ```

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"></xref> control becomes the active view.
trans-unit.target: 발생 경우 현재 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"> </xref> 컨트롤은 활성 뷰가 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The Activate event is raised when the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control becomes the active view.
trans-unit.target: Activate 이벤트가 발생할 때 현재 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>컨트롤은 활성 뷰.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: This occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> property changes or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.SetActiveView%2A> method is called to specify a different <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control.
trans-unit.target: 이 문제가 발생 때의 값은 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A>속성 변경 내용을 또는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.SetActiveView%2A>메서드를 다른 지정 하는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.SetActiveView%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if `View1` is the active view within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control, when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> property changes to specify `View2`, the Activate event is raised for `View2` and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate> event is raised for `View1`.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 경우 `View1` 내에서 현재 보기가 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>제어 때는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A>지정 하려면 속성 변경 내용을 `View2`, 활성화 이벤트가 발생 `View2` 및 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate>에 대 한 이벤트는 `View1`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the current active <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"></xref> control becomes inactive.
trans-unit.target: 발생 경우 현재 활성 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"> </xref> 제어 비활성화 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The Deactivate event is raised when the current active <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control becomes inactive.
trans-unit.target: Deactivate 이벤트가 발생할 때 현재 활성 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>컨트롤이 비활성화 될.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control becomes inactive when the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> property changes or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.SetActiveView%2A> method is called to specify a different <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>컨트롤은 비활성의 값은 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A>속성 변경 내용을 또는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.SetActiveView%2A>메서드를 다른 지정 하는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.SetActiveView%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: For example, if `View1` is the active view within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control, when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> property changes to specify `View2`, the Deactivate event is raised for `View1` and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate> event is raised for `View2`.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 경우 `View1` 내에서 현재 보기가 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>제어 때는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A>속성 변경 내용을 지정 `View2`, Deactivate 이벤트가 한 `View1` 및 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate>에 대 한 이벤트는 `View2`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView.ActiveViewIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether themes apply to this control.
trans-unit.target: 이 컨트롤에 테마를 적용할지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The EnableTheming property indicates whether themes are enabled for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control.
trans-unit.target: EnableTheming 속성에 대 한 테마를 사용할 수 있는지 여부를 나타냅니다.는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: The EnableTheming property also affects whether themes are enabled for the controls contained in its <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: EnableTheming 속성도 영향을 줍니다에 포함 된 컨트롤에 대 한 테마를 사용할 수 있는지 여부를 해당 <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A?displayProperty=fullName>컬렉션.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When the EnableTheming property is `true`, the application's theme directory is searched for control skins to apply.
trans-unit.target: EnableTheming 속성이 `true`을 적용할 컨트롤 스킨에 대 한 응용 프로그램의 테마 디렉터리를 검색 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If no skin for the particular control exists in the theme directory, a skin is not applied.
trans-unit.target: 테마 디렉터리에 특정 컨트롤에 대 한 스킨이 스킨 적용 되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: When the EnableTheming property is `false`, the theme directory is not searched and the contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SkinID%2A> property are not used.
trans-unit.target: EnableTheming 속성이 `false`, 테마 디렉터리 검색 되지 않고의 내용과 <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SkinID%2A>속성은 사용 되지 않습니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SkinID%2A>

trans-unit.source: A control can override the EnableTheming value set by its parent control, or by the containing page.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤이 부모 컨트롤을 포함 하는 페이지의 설정 EnableTheming 값을 재정의할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, if a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control has EnableTheming set to `false`, you can selectively apply themes to child controls contained within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableTheming%2A> property to `true` on the individual child controls.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 경우는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>컨트롤에 EnableTheming로 설정 `false`, 포함 된 자식 컨트롤에 테마를 선택적으로 적용할 수는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>설정 하 여 컨트롤의 <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableTheming%2A>속성을 `true` 개별 자식 컨트롤에.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableTheming%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to use themes; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>테마를 사용 하려면 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 발생는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate"> </xref> 의 이벤트는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate> event is raised when the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control becomes the active view.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate>이벤트가 발생할 때 현재 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>컨트롤은 활성 뷰.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Activate>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>이벤트 데이터를 포함 하는.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 발생는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate"> </xref> 의 이벤트는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate> event is raised when the current active <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control becomes inactive.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate>이벤트가 발생할 때 현재 활성 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>제어 비활성화 됩니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View.Deactivate>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>이벤트 데이터를 포함 하는.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"></xref> control is visible.
trans-unit.target: 표시 하는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다. 여부는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"> </xref> 컨트롤이 표시 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the Visible property to determine whether the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control is visible and rendered to the client.
trans-unit.target: Visible 속성을 사용 하 여 확인 하려면 여부 현재 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>클라이언트에 컨트롤의 표시 및 렌더링 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: For a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control to be visible on the rendered page, it must be the active view in its containing <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control, and the containing <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control must be visible.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>렌더링된 된 페이지에 표시 되도록 제어 하 고, 현재 보기를 포함 하 여야 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>제어 및 포함 하는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>컨트롤이 표시 되어야 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: If the containing <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control is not visible on the page, or if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control is not the active view, then the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control and its child controls are not rendered.
trans-unit.target: 경우 포함 하는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>컨트롤이 페이지에 표시 되지 않으면 또는 경우에는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>컨트롤이 현재 보기 않습니다. 그런 다음 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>컨트롤과 해당 자식 컨트롤은 렌더링 되지 않습니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Visible property is set internally based on the visibility and active view for the containing parent control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] >의 Visible 속성을 포함 하는 부모 컨트롤에 대 한 현재 보기의 표시 여부에 따라 내부적으로 설정 되어 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: If you set this property at run time, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 런타임 시이 속성을 설정 하는 경우는 <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>예외가 throw 됩니다.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: If you set the Visible property at design time, any changes to the property are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 디자인 타임에 Visible 속성을 설정 하는 경우 속성에 변경 내용을 무시 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"></xref> control is visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.View"> </xref> 컨트롤은 표시 되 고, 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set this property at run time.
trans-unit.target: 런타임 시이 속성을 설정 하려고 했습니다.
